quality_gates.description: Enable/disable quality gates that block PRs on low scores

groundedness.description: Minimum groundedness score (0.0 to 1.0). Set to 0.5 (50%) to allow PRs with 50% or higher groundedness.

relevance.description: Minimum relevance score (0.0 to 1.0). Set to 0.5 (50%) to allow PRs with 50% or higher relevance.

quality_gates.aggregation_description: How to aggregate scores: 'average' (all metrics must meet threshold), 'any' (at least one must meet threshold), or 'all' (all metrics must meet threshold)

notes: min_score values: 0.0 (any score passes) to 1.0 (perfect score required)
Set enabled: false to disable quality gates without blocking
aggregation 'average': average of all enabled metrics must meet their thresholds
aggregation 'any': at least one enabled metric must meet its threshold (most permissive)
aggregation 'all': all enabled metrics must meet their thresholds (most strict)
